message.raw:
Fix for properly including GDAL headers on non-ubuntu systems

In a perfect world, I would not have put an 'include_directories' in the root
level CMakeLists.txt, but it turns out that's the only way the build will
actually parallelize without errors.

actually parallelize without errors.

message:
Fix for properly including GDAL headers on non-ubuntu systems

In a perfect world, I would not have put an 'include_directories' in the root
level CMakeLists.txt, but it turns out that's the only way the build will
actually parallelize without errors.
